title: Manage Event Day Staffing
description: On game day, several ushers call in sick. A manager needs to adjust staffing levels to ensure all sections are covered.

tasks.description: Receive notifications of the staff absences.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a list of all staff members who have called in sick.

tasks.description: Review the original staffing plan and identify the now-uncovered sections.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies three stadium sections that are now understaffed.

tasks.description: Reassign staff from less critical areas or on-call staff to cover the empty positions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the staffing plan to cover all critical areas.

tasks.description: Notify the reassigned staff of their new positions for the day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends out notifications to the affected staff members.
